summary: A comprehensive unit test suite that validates the behavior of many-to-many relationship operations in the ORM, covering addition, removal, assignment, clearing, bulk deletion, prefetch handling, forward and reverse interactions, queryset assignments, inheritance scenarios, and deprecation warnings.
business_intent: Ensure that many-to-many relationship management functions correctly across various use cases and edge cases, providing confidence that the ORM handles these operations reliably and adheres to expected semantics.
